verbs.description: [ARG0: surgical robot] [V: makes] [ARG1: highly precise eye injection possible] [ARGM-TMP: for the first time ever a team of eye surgeons were able to inject a thrombolytic drug directly into a patient retinal vein to dissolve a blood clot it was katholieke universiteit leuven central retinal vein occlusion]
